text: Shinjin no makoto o tsukushite tsukaeru no wa, arra ni taishi tozende wanai ka. Daga kare o sashioite (hoka ni) hogo-sha o motomeru mono wa,`watashi-tachi ga kare-ra (kamigami) ni tsukaeru no wa tada watashi-tachi ga arra no o-gawa ni chikadzuku tamedearu.'(To iu). Hontoni arra wa kare-ra no kotonaru ten ni tsuite, kanarazu so no ma o saiketsu nasa reru. Arra wa, kyogi de onwowasureru-sha o onmichibiki ni nara renai
